doc:
Chris-Pin Martin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris-Pin_Martin 0 Chris-Pin Martin (born Ysabel Ponciana Chris-Pin Martin Paiz, November 19, 1893 – June 27, 1953) was an American character actor whose specialty lay in portraying comical Mexicans, particularly sidekicks in The Cisco Kid film series. He acted in over 100 films between 1925 and 1953, including over 50 westerns. Chris-Pin_Martin ( born Ysabel_Ponciana_Chris-Pin_Martin_Paiz , November_19_,_1893 – June_27_,_1953 ) was an_American_character_actor whose_specialty lay in portraying comical_Mexicans , particularly sidekicks in The_Cisco_Kid_film_series . He acted in over_100_films between 1925_and_1953 , including over_50_westerns .
